txt.en: The barren patches of land in the Black Heart still bear the shades of terrible events in the past, long remembering the suffering of the trees.
Many blackened swaths of land are barren even of the twisted plants that grow in the darkest part of the forest. What happened here to turn the Black Heart so rotten?

The barren patches of land in the Black Heart still bear the shades of terrible events in the past, long remembering the suffering of the trees.\n\nWhere is the Ent you saw that once watched over these lands? If his realm has grown so dark, what has become of him?
Many blackened swaths of land are barren even of the twisted plants that grow in the darkest part of the forest. What happened here to turn the Black Heart so rotten?
The land itself remembers the cruelties done to the trees, and will not grow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find barren patches of land in the Black Heart
Barren patches of land can be found throughout the Black Heart in Fangorn, especially in the deeper reaches of the wood.\n\nYou should examine the barren patches to see why nothing will grow there.
Barren patches of land can be found throughout the Black Heart in Fangorn, especially in the deeper reaches of the wood.\n\nYou should examine the barren patches to see why nothing will grow there.
